author: Staff Reporter
text:
Residents of Anthoniyarpuram staged a demonstration in front of the Collectorate here demanding better roads in their area. They said that Anthoniyarpuram was one of the worst hit localities in the recent heavy rain and flood.

Since the service road along Palayamkottai Bypass Road had been damaged, they were facing hardship, said Michael Jebamalai, president, St. Antony’s Church Committee, who led the agitation. No remedial measures had been taken to improve poor road conditions in their area, he said.

He also sought adequate relief assistance to the victims affected by the flood. A petition was submitted to Collector M. Ravikumar.
title: Residents demand better roads
